name: Hurdle Ball
description:
Roll your ball around the platform and jump to doge the incoming hurdles!

Instructions:

Use the arrow keys to move. Use the space bar to jump. The game begins immediately upon start. Colliding with any of the red hurdles results in losing the game. Additionally, falling off the platform will also result in a loss. Hurdles are randomly sent from any of the four main directions, so be ready for anything. To win, you must survive all the incoming hurdles (25) without hitting any!

Note: Turn the sound on for the full game experience!
